resources.string:
Welcome to TableCloth.

Our audience is anyone that cooks or wants to cook. We also have a portion of our app that is tailored towards college kids as sometimes we donâ€™t have time to figure out what we want to make.

The fridge database solves this issue as we can auto-find recipes based on what we currently have. If someone wants to know a recipe for a food that they find interesting, they can take a picture of it and then they have the recipe for future reference.
Ajit is currently a 4th year Computer Science major at UCSB. In his free time he enjoys watching Food Network, specifically Chopped.
Cindy is a 4th year computer science major. She likes to bake and watch cakeboss and the great british baking show.y
Wesley is a currently a 4th year Computer Science major at UCSB. In his free time he likes to cook using recipes found from Tablecloth.
Shu is currently a 4th year at UCSB studying computer science. Her friends love to call her by Shushi, Shu Mai, or BingShu. In her free time she likes to discover new music
